title: Why It's Anyone's Guess What Happens After the Kavanaugh Hearing
description:
The day before Brett Kavanaugh is excepted to face off with his original accuser, a third woman has stepped forward with her own claims of sexual misconduct. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's Sahil Kapur on how the ongoing scandal is becoming an ongoing problem for the GOP. 
FOLLOW UP
Sahil's Latest: Kavanaugh Battle Squeezes GOP Between Base and Women Voters
You can follow Sahil at: @sahilkapur
---
TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
